name: GetZoomTelephoneReport
description:
Retrieve Zoom telephone report for specified meetings.

Use this tool to access detailed telephone reports for Zoom meetings, showing who dialed in via phone, the numbers used, and additional information. Useful for analyzing audio conferencing data within a specified timeframe.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for the report in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range should cover only one month.

value_schema.description: Start date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range defined by the "from" and "to" parameters should only be one month as the report includes only one month worth of data at once.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date for the report in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. It should be within one month of the start date.

parameters.name: audio_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of audio. Options: '1' for Toll-free Call-in & Call-out, '2' for Toll, or '3' for SIP Connected Audio.

value_schema.description:
Audio types:  
 `1` - Toll-free Call-in & Call-out.  
 `2` - Toll   
 
`3` - SIP Connected Audio

parameters.name: date_query_type
parameters.description: Specifies the date type for the report query. Options: 'start_time', 'end_time', 'meeting_start_time', or 'meeting_end_time'. Defaults to 'start_time'.

value_schema.description:
The type of date to query. 
* `start_time` — Query by call start time. 
* `end_time` — Query by call end time. 
* `meeting_start_time` — Query by meeting start time. 
* `meeting_end_time` — Query by meeting end time. 

This value defaults to `start_time`.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to return in a single API call. Useful for managing large data sets efficiently.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: pagination_page_number
parameters.description: Deprecated. Use the page number for current records pagination unless using 'meeting_start_time' or 'meeting_end_time'.

value_schema.description:
The page number of the current page in the returned records. This field is **not** available if the `query_date_type` parameter is the `meeting_start_time` or `meeting_end_time` value. 

This field is deprecated. Use the `next_page_token` query parameter for pagination.

parameters.name: pagination_next_page_token
parameters.description: Token for retrieving the next set of results in large data sets. Expires in 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

This field is deprecated. Use the `next_page_token` query parameter for pagination.
